title: _GET_ENTITY_INSIDE_EXPLOSION_AREA
content:
0x14BA4BA137AF6CEC0xAEC0D176// GetEntityInsideExplosionArea
Entity _GET_ENTITY_INSIDE_EXPLOSION_AREA(int explosionType, float x1, float y1, float z1, float x2, float y2, float z2, float radius);Parameters:explosionType: See ADD_EXPLOSION.x1: y1: z1: x2: y2: z2: radius: Returns a handle to the first entity within the a circle spawned inside the 2 points from a radius.Old name:  _GET_PED_INSIDE_EXPLOSION_AREA
codeBlocks:
// GetEntityInsideExplosionArea
Entity _GET_ENTITY_INSIDE_EXPLOSION_AREA(int explosionType, float x1, float y1, float z1, float x2, float y2, float z2, float radius);
Returns a handle to the first entity within the a circle spawned inside the 2 points from a radius.
